snippet.title: 001 SONIC ADVENTURE - Not really a Sonic game | DREAMVERSE
snippet.description:
This is a video about a couple of things, but mostly Sonic Adventure for the Dreamcast.
With a design philosophy that were supposed to revitalize the Sonic brand, it instead became a game with perhaps too many new characters and not enough Sonic. Welcome to the game that took the first step towards hedgehogs kissing human women.

'Dreamverse' is about a chronologically talking, in a semi-deep voice, about every European and North American released game for SEGAs last console.

Apologies for sometimes butchering the japanese language (and other languages).

Music by Oculus_Official,
a track called "Home"
https://youtu.be/ZKmvj5FIpgk

'Miggy' has a great run through of Emerald Hill Zone from Sonic 2.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=m-RzlTT-v0E&t=1141s

Sonic Commercials 1991-2017
https://youtu.be/uyupFK5Gnig

Dreamcast Commercials
https://youtu.be/3e1HZsrL8CQ

Sega Saturn 3D Model
https://3dwarehouse.sketchup.com/model/86e4194e00424702d261b72fcd57b375/Sega-saturn

Sony Playstation 3D Model
https://3dwarehouse.sketchup.com/model/e93fb2ca5e924abf8f2991a13cd7020/PlayStation-1-Orginal-Full-Detal
